page.title: 16TRANSPORT AROUND BYFIELD
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN OUR AREA USE CARS AS TRANSPORT ALTHOUGH SOME OCCASIONALLY USE PUBLIC TRANSPORT AND SOMETIMES RIDE OR WALK.PUBLIC TRANSPORT IN BYFIELD IS VERY INEFFICIENT AND SOME PEOPLE DON'T LIKE IT BECAUSE OF THE CIGARETTE SMOKE. IMPROVEMENT FOR THE MAIN ROAD IS VERY POPULAR AND ONLY ONE PERSON THAT WE ASKED SAID IT DID NOT NEED IT.FINALLY, WE FOUND THAT MOST PEOPLE IN OUR AREA TRAVEL TO DAVENTRY.IN THE PARISH OF BODDINGTON THEY HAVE NO PUBLIC TRANSPORT.THEY HAVE A BUS SERVICE FOR SCHOOLCHILDREN BUT OTHERWISE THE PEOPLE USE CARS OR BICYCLES AS TRANSPORT.
